nodes.text: Star Wars 7 is the seventh issue in the Star Wars comic book series. The series take place between Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope and Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back.
This issue also features a preview for the then-upcoming The Star Wars miniseries, which adapts George Lucas' first draft of what would become Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope.

Princess Leia takes the Rebels' secret mission to the next level! Playing it safe has gotten them nowhere, and they are running out of resources and time. What's the fastest way to get inside info on the Empire? Have your top pilots get themselves captured!
